transformations.name: AlterRow
transformations.description: Upsert if pk key is not null

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PK_KEY as string,
		CPT_DESCRIPTION as string,
		CPT_NUMBER as integer,
		INSERTED_BY as string,
		DATE_INSERTED as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['Pre_Dim/pre_dim_currency.parquet']) ~> preDimCurrency
preDimCurrency derive(top_key = 'ALL',
		top_description = 'All Currencies') ~> DeriveTopLevel
DeriveTopLevel alterRow(upsertIf(!isNull(PK_KEY))) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['dim_currency.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> dimCurrency
